          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Potassium reacting with water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalium, das mit Wasser reagiert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Potassium réagissant avec de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potassium que reage com água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potassio che reagisce con acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάλιο που αντιδρά με το ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potasio que reacciona con agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that solid potassium hydroxide and hydrogen gas is formed when potassium reacts with water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogenation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß festes Kaliumhydroxid
und Wasserstoffgas gebildet wird, wenn Kalium mit Wasser reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'hydroxyde de 
potassium et le gaz d'hydrogène pleins est formé quand le potassium 
réagit avec de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o hydroxide do 
potassium e o gás de hidrogênio contínuos estão dados forma quando
o potassium reage com água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'idrossido del 
potassio e l'idrogeno solidi è formato quando il potassio reagisce 
con acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το στερεά υδροξείδιο 
και το υδρογόνο καλίου αέριο διαμορφώνονται όταν αντιδρά το 
κάλιο με το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el hidróxido del 
potasio y el gas de hidrógeno sólidos está formado cuando el 
potasio reacciona con agua.</string>
          </description>
